member.name: T:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Cram
member.summary: Implementation of CRAM-MD5 function according to RFC 2195 and 2104.

member.name: T:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest
member.summary:
Cryptography algorithm for DIGEST-MD5 cryptography.
RFC 1321, RFC 2831

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest._digestChallenge
member.summary:
Description of digest algorithm:
digest-challenge = 1#( realm | nonce | qop-options | stale | maxbuf | charset algorithm | cipher-opts | auth-param ) realm = "realm" "=" " realm-value " realm-value = qdstr-val nonce = "nonce" "=" "nonce-value " nonce-value = qdstr-val qop-options = "qop" "=" " qop-list " qop-list = 1#qop-value qop-value = "auth" | "auth-int" | "auth-conf" | token stale = "stale" "=" "true" maxbuf = "maxbuf" "=" maxbuf-value maxbuf-value = 1*DIGIT charset = "charset" "=" "utf-8" algorithm = "algorithm" "=" "md5-sess" cipher-opts = "cipher" "=" "1#cipher-value" cipher-value = "3des" | "des" | "rc4-40" | "rc4" | "rc4-56" | token auth-param = token "=" ( token | quoted-string )

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest._digestData
member.summary: Array after parsing digest challenge from server.

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest._service
member.summary: Digest-uri value imap/servername.com.

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest._cnonce_value
member.summary: Client string unique for each response.

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest._server_response
member.summary: Response value from server after send client authentication string.

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest._qopLevel
member.summary: Ordering for the "quality of protection" tokens (server presents a list, client selects the best from it).
member.remarks: Maps string to int.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.DigestMD5(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create Digest-MD5 hash string.
member.param: User name.
Password.
member.returns: Digest-MD5 hash string.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.GetQop
member.summary: Selects the best "quality of protection" from the list sent by server.
member.returns: One of "", "auth", "auth-int" or "auth-conf".

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.DigestResponse(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create digest response string.
member.param: User name to server.
Password to server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.GetEncodedClientData(System.String)
member.summary: Username and password encoding, as specified by RFC 2831: Even if "charset=UTF-8" is present, if all the characters are in the ISO 8859-1 character set, then the value must be converted to ISO 8859-1 before being hashed.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.CompareResponse(System.String)
member.summary: Compare computing client digest-value and value from the server.
member.param: BASE64 encoding string digest-response from the server.
member.returns: True if response from server equals the response string generated by client.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.DigestValue(System.String)
member.summary: Return digest val from values sent from server.
member.param: digest property.
member.returns: Value of digest property.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CryptMD5Digest.ToWide(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Casts bytes to characters without changing their numerical values.
member.remarks: Encoding.GetString gives the same results as this method for ASCII data, but not in general (i.e. Windows 1250 converts byte 135 into character 8825).

member.name: T:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.MD5DigestExceptionCause
member.summary: The ways DIGEST-MD5 can fail (currently just one).

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.MD5DigestExceptionCause.InsufficientEncoding
member.summary: Authentication data doesn't fit into Latin 1, but server doesn't support any other charset.

member.name: F:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.MD5DigestExceptionCause.NoQopValueRecognized
member.summary: Server offers no recognizable quality of protection values.

member.name: T:Rebex.Mime.Util.LineReceiver
member.summary: LineReceiver is an abstract write-only stream that breaks all incoming data into lines of a given maximum length delimited by CRLF sequences. When a complete line is processed, the virtual method is called and the line is passed as a parameter. Classes that need this functionality should inherit from and override the method.

member.name: M:Rebex.Mime.Util.LineReceiver.ProcessLine(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A method that is called for each received line.
member.param: A buffer that contains the received line.
An offset indicating the start of the received line in the buffer.
Number of bytes in line, starting at offset.
True if a complete CRLF-terminated line was received; false if no CRLF was found.

member.name: M:Rebex.Mime.Util.LineReceiver.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of LineReceiver class.
member.param: Maximum line length, allowed range is 74 to 256K.

member.name: M:Rebex.Mime.Util.LineReceiver.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of LineReceiver class with a maximum line length of 65536.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.CspHashAlgorithm.HashFinal
member.summary: Finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.
member.returns: The computed hash code.

member.name: M:Rebex.Security.Cryptography.MD4.Create
member.summary: Creates a cryptographic object to compute the MD4 hash.
member.returns: A cryptographic object to compute the MD4 hash.

The value to write.

member.summary: Writes a pointer to the specified offset of the memory block.

The value to write.

member.summary: Disposes the object and releases resources.
member.remarks: Calling this method ensures that all resources are freed.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: Finalizer called by garbage collector.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.RebexAsyncResult
member.summary: Universal class for asynchronous method invocation.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.RebexAsyncResult.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: If true, is called by IDisposable.Dispose. Otherwise it is called by finalizer.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.RebexAsyncResult.Dispose
member.summary: Implementation of IDisposable.Dispose()

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.RebexAsyncResult.SimpleThreadPool.Find(System.Threading.Thread)
member.summary: Find the ThreadInfo instance that corresponds to the thread

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.RebexAsyncResult.SimpleThreadPool.FindFreeThread
member.summary: Find a free thread

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.DestuffingStream
member.summary: A adapter removing byte-stuffing (as defined by RFC 1939, i.e. replacing two dots at the start of a line with one) and the finishing line (consisting of a single dot) of POP3 multi-line responses written into it.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.DestuffingStream.Close
member.summary: Writes all data buffered by this object to the underlying stream and closes that stream.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: Finalizer. Called by garbage collector during object destruction.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Abort
member.summary: Aborts the current operation.

remarks.p: The aborted operation will end either successfully, or with of status OperationAborted or Timeout. The object may remain in Reading, Sending or Processing state. In this case, the object is not usable any more and a call to is recommended.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the POP3 server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.
The server port (eg. 110).
member.returns: The welcome message returned by the server.

member.summary: Connects to the POP3 server with the specified security.

The server port (eg. 110).
Security parameters
Connection security.
member.returns: The welcome message returned by the server.

member.summary: Deletes any messages marked as deleted and terminate the connection.

member.returns: The exit message returned by the server.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 QUIT command, with optional preceeding RSET.

member.summary: Secures the connection with TLS/SSL using default parameters.

member.summary: Retrieves message numbers using the LIST command.
member.returns: An array (of positive length) containing the message numbers, or null (meaning that the server didn't list any messages).
member.remarks: This method may only be called in Transaction state.

member.summary: Retrieves message numbers using the LIST command.
member.returns: An array (of positive length) containing the message numbers, or null (meaning that the server didn't list any messages).
member.remarks: This method may only be called in Transaction state.

member.summary: Determines the unique ID of the message with the specified number.
member.returns: The unique ID of the message.
member.remarks: Uses POP3 UIDL command to retrieve the unique ID.

member.summary: Determines the length of the message with the specified number.

member.remarks: Uses POP3 LIST command to retrieve the length.

member.summary: Authenticates the user to the POP3 server using the specified authentication method.

Password.
Authentication method.

member.summary: Send STAT command to a POP3 server and parse the response.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Undelete
member.summary: Unmarks any messages that have been marked as deleted.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 RSET command.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Marks a message as deleted. Messages marked as deleted will actually be deleted after a call to method.
member.param: The sequence number of the message to delete.

remarks.p: Represents POP3 DELE command.
Use method to unmarked messages marked as deleted.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageList(Rebex.Net.Pop3ListFields)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of messages in the mailbox.
member.param: Specifies the scope of information to determine about each message.
member.returns: The list of messages.
member.remarks: Uses either POP3 LIST command, UIDL command, or a combination of both.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageHeaders(System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Downloads the headers of a message with a specified number from the server and writes it into a supplied stream.
member.param: The sequence number of the message to download headers from.
Stream that will receive the message headers.
member.remarks: "Uses POP3 "TOP 1" command to retrieve the headers.
member.returns: The length of the headers in bytes.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageInfo(System.Int32,Rebex.Net.Pop3ListFields)
member.summary: Gets information about a message with the specified sequence number.
member.param: Message sequence number.
Specifies the scope of information to determine about each message.
member.returns: A message info.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.SendCommand(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a custom command to the POP3 server.
member.param: Command (eg. "HELP").
Indicates whether the response for the command is multiline or single line.

remarks.p: Must be followed by either one or more calls to ReadResponse method, depending on the value of multiline parameter.
Use ReadResponse and SendCommand to implement various custom commands.
After a successful call to SendCommand, the object will be in Reading state.
The object must be Ready when calling this method.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.ReadResponse
member.summary: Returns a single line of response of the POP3 server to the command.
member.returns: Response of the POP3 server.

remarks.p: Must be preceeded by a call to SendCommand method. (Or, more exactly, the must be Reading.
Use ReadResponse and SendCommand to implement various custom commands.
If the response is multiline, ReadResponse must be called multiple times until it returns null, which indicates an and of response.
If the response is single line, ReadResponse must be called only once.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.CheckConnectionState
member.summary: Checks whether the POP3 session is still connected. Throws an exception on error.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetConnectionState
member.summary: Checks whether the POP3 session is still connected and returns its state.
member.returns: Connection state.

member.summary: Authenticates the user to the POP3 server.

Password.
member.remarks: This method tries to authenticate using one of the following methods in this order of preference: CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5, APOP, PLAIN, LOGIN, ClearText.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.BeginSendCommand(System.String,System.Boolean,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous operation to send a custom command to the POP3 server.
member.param: Command (eg. "HELP").
Indicates whether the response for the command is multiline or single line.
An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.p: Must be followed by either one or more calls to ReadResponse method, depending on the value of multiline parameter.
Use ReadResponse and SendCommand to implement various custom commands.
After a successful call to SendCommand, the object will be in Reading state.
The object must be Ready state when calling this method.

member.summary: Starts an asynchronous operation to retrieve the size of the mailbox - the sum of lengths of all messages.
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.p: Uses POP3 STAT command.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.EndGetMailboxSize(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends a pending asynchronous mailbox size request.
member.param: Stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.BeginReadResponse(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous operation to return a single line of response of the POP3 server to the command
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.p: Must be preceeded by a call to SendCommand method. (Or, more exactly, the must be Reading.
Use ReadResponse and SendCommand to implement various custom commands.
If the response is multiline, ReadResponse have to be called multiple times until it returns null, which indicates an and of response.
If the response is single line, ReadResponse must be called only once.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.EndReadResponse(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends a pending asynchronous read response.
member.param: Stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.
member.returns: Response of the POP3 server.

members.member:
Starts an asynchronous operation to retrieve a list of messages in the mailbox.
Specifies the scope of information to determine about each message. An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete. A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation. An that references the asynchronous operation. /// Uses either POP3 LIST command, UIDL command, or a combination of both.

member.summary: Gets or sets POP3 object options.

member.summary: Gets the bit field specifying the extensions supported by the server.

member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the control connection is secured.
member.value: True if secure, false if not secure.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.TlsSocket
member.summary: Returns the TLS/SSL socket of secured control connection.
member.returns: The TLS/SSL socket of secured control connection, or null if the connection is not secured.
member.remarks: This property is intended for advanced users only. class does not expect the socket to be altered in any way.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time before the operation times out (specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out).
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the operation times out, or the value -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out. Default is 60000 (60 seconds).

remarks.p: The internal timeout counter is reset every time data is sent or received from to server.
The property affects both synchronous and asynchronous methods.
Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.AbortTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time before the abort operation times out.
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the abort operation times out. Default is 3000, which seems to be a reasonable value.
member.remarks: Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ConnectFailure
member.summary: The remote service point could not be contacted at the transport level.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ConnectionClosed
member.summary: The connection was prematurely closed.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.SocketError
member.summary: The error at transport level occured.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.NameResolutionFailure
member.summary: The name resolver service could not resolve the host name.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.Pending
member.summary: An operation is pending.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ProtocolError
member.summary: The response received from the server was complete but indicated a protocol-level error.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ProxyNameResolutionFailure
member.summary: The name resolver service could not resolve the proxy host name.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.OperationAborted
member.summary: The operation was aborted by a call to the method.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.UnclassifiableError
member.summary: An unclassifiable error occurred. This is the default value for .

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ServerProtocolViolation
member.summary: The server response was not a valid POP3 response.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.Timeout
member.summary: No response was received during the time-out period for a request.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.AsyncError
member.summary: General exception in asynchronous call.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.LoginRequired
member.summary: The operation cannot be performed before a successful login.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.OperationFailure
member.summary: The requested operation could not be completed.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparer
member.summary: Class used to compare Pop3MessageInfo objects.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Pop3MessageInfoComparer with default sorting by sequence number name and with ascending sort mode.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparer.#ctor(Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparerType)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Pop3MessageInfoComparer with specified comparer type and ascending sort mode.
member.param: Type of comparer.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparer.#ctor(Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparerType,Rebex.SortingOrder)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Pop3MessageInfoComparer with specified comparer type and sort mode.
member.param: Type of comparer.
Sort order to use.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfoComparer.Compare(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: IComparer interface implementation. Compares two instances of Pop3MessageInfo.
member.param: First object to compare.
Second object to compare.
member.returns: Value greater than zero when x is greater then y, zero when they are equal a or less than zero when x is lesser than y.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3Security
member.summary: Specifies the POP3 connection security.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Security.Unsecure
member.summary: Initially unsecured connection.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Security.Implicit
member.summary: Implicitly secured connection.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Security.Explicit
member.summary: Explicitly secured connection. Same as Secure.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Security.Secure
member.summary: Explicitly secured connection. Same as Explicit.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options
member.summary: Specifies various POP3 options.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options.None
member.summary: No options.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options.IgnoreUnparsableHeaders
member.summary: Ignore unparsable headers when parsing mail message.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options.IgnoreUnparsableSignatures
member.summary: Ignore unparsable S/MIME signature entities when parsing mail message.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options.DoNotAllowDuplicateUniqueIds
member.summary: Throw an exception if duplicate unique ID is encountered by the GetMessageList method. This was default behavior until Rebex Mail 1.0.3333.0 (inclusive).

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options.IgnoreInvalidEndings
member.summary: Ignore invalid endings before the actual end of message data.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Options.DisableGmailRetrieveWorkaround
member.summary: Disables workaroud for non-standard behavior of Gmail's RETR command.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication
member.summary: POP3 authentication method.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Auto
member.summary: Choose automatically.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Plain
member.summary: RFC 2595 TLS plaintext authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.DigestMD5
member.summary: RFC 2831 DIGEST-MD5 authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.CramMD5
member.summary: RFC 2195 CRAM-MD5 authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Login
member.summary: Login authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.ClearText
member.summary: Clear text USER/PASS login.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.APop
member.summary: APOP.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Ntlm
member.summary: NTLM authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.GssApi
member.summary: GSSAPI/SSPI authentication (only Kerberos, NTLM and Negotiate (SPNEGO) are currently supported).

member.summary: Client is not connected.

member.summary: Connecting to server.

member.summary: Server is ready and awaiting commands.

member.summary: Sending command to the server.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3State.Reading
member.summary: Waiting for response or receiving response.

member.summary: Receiving multiline response data.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3State.Disposed
member.summary: Object is disposed and must not be used.

member.summary: No transfer pending.

member.summary: Downloading mail message.

member.summary: Sequence number.

member.summary: Unique ID.

member.summary: Length.

member.summary: Sequence number, Length and Unique ID.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3ConnectionState
member.summary: Represents the Pop3 object connection state.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3ConnectionState.Connection
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the object is connected.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3ConnectionState.NativeErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the Win32 socket error code.
member.remarks: Returns 0 if no socket error code is available.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Control.Dispose
member.summary: Closes the underlying socket.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Control.ReceiveLine(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Reads a line from server (blocking until the server sends it).
member.remarks: If the server doesn't send anything at all in milliseconds, this method throws.
member.returns: An array (never null) of at least 2 bytes ending with CR LF.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Control.SendLine(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends data to the connected server.
member.param: The bytes to send (the array must be non-null and have a positive length).
member.remarks: Callers wishing to end the line with CR LF must add the characters themselves.
